prompt:
Aether Elemental gender Fantasy Avatar
Element: Aether
Title: Aether elemental cosmic bridge
Lens: 80mm
Style: Photorealistic
Features: Body composed of swirling, ethereal energies, eyes that contain glimpses of other dimensions.
Attire: Flowing garments that seem to exist between realities, shimmering with otherworldly energies.
Pose: frontal medium-shot portrait.
Background: The space between dimensions, a swirling vortex of possibility where realities intersect and diverge.

Style: Photorealistic

Attire: Flowing, diaphanous robes that ripple with auroral patterns.
Pose: frontal medium-shot portrait.
Background: The polar night sky, alive with a dance of lights, figure framed against the majesty of natural light shows.
